name: Digby Extreme
description: Help Digby dig, set off bombs, dodge cave-ins and evade a colourful cast of foes in Digby Extreme - an explosive new endless digger from 3 Sprockets! Get your modern retro gaming on!
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel i3+ or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8800, Radeon HD35xx, Intel HD 4000+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i5+ or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 560+ or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
